name: inventory-app
description: inventory app using client-side rendering, React, Redux, Webpack, Express, MongoDB

scripts.build: NODE_PATH=./src browserify -p [css-modulesify -o dist/main.css --json dist/css-modules.json --global true] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] ./src/main.js -o ./dist/bundle.js
scripts.watch: NODE_PATH=./src watchify -p [css-modulesify -o dist/main.css --json dist/css-modules.json --global true] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -p [ browserify-livereload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 1337 ] ./src/main.js -o ./dist/bundle.js -v

author: korshunad
